author: rhuijben
msg: Reduce the number of DB operations to retrieve a URL from libsvn_client,
In several places we retrieved the url in more than one way to determine
which one to use, while generally wc_db can simply answer the question:
(get_full_mergeinfo): Get the origin instead of relying on a specific error.
Use svn_wc__node_get_origin() instead of 3 (or more) db calls.

author: simonw
msg: fixing testHealthyness since we now don't stall on bytesUsed explicitly

author: coheigea
msg: Changing license header in the remaining tests.

author: fchrist
msg: STANBOL-144 splitted doc of different resources into their own files and made them accessible via GET TEXT_HTML on the resource
